name: The Third Book of the Dun Cow: Peace at the Last
name_original: The Third Book of the Dun Cow: Peace at the Last
description:
Pertelote, the chicken, treads softly across a darkened land. Behind her lies Chauntecleer, the rooster, fallen and dead, slain in that horrible battle. She flees because she must, for  Wyrm, the great serpent, has made his way into the hearts of the wolves and turned them against the Meek. Only Boreas remains free, and he flees with them. Where they go, they do not know. They must have faith.

The Third Book of the Dun Cow: Peace at the Last, is a video game of the novel by Walter Wangerin Jr. It is the third book in the Book of the Dun Cow Trilogy. Featuring voiced cutscenes and eight awesome levels, this final epic is sure to immerse you as the epic story unfolds! Featuring:

  • 5+ cutscenes with voice acting and music tracks!
  • Collectable armor with different stats!
  • A huge inventory system!
  • A crafting system to craft your own armor!
  • Play as Boreas, Pertelote, and Wachanga!
  • Attack enemies using a variety of attacks, such as reverse bursts, firey explosions, and bites!
  • Atmospheric music!
  • Epic boss battles!
  • And more!

If you enjoy the game, don't forget to leave a review! Thanks!
